title: Agent｜吴恩达系列之Agentic Workflow
comment: Source: WeChat, Published: 2025-11-30 13:40:24
summary: 一、什么是 Agentic Workflow？Agentic Workflow（智能体工作流）是指：基于LLM的应用，通过自主规划、调用工具、反思迭代等多个步骤，协同完成一个复杂任务的端到端流程。

title: 从MIT最新研究看Agentic AI的现实跃迁——智能体已非“未来”，而是“现在进行时”
comment: Source: WeChat, Published: 2025-11-30 10:47:07
summary: 值得关注的是，Agentic AI的落地并非“全场景替代”，而是“补位高重复、强规则、需跨系统协作”的环节。例如，在法律行业中，它可快速梳理案件卷宗、匹配相似判例、生成法律文书框架；

title: Fara-7B — 微软推出可在本地运行的小型 agentic 模型
comment: Source: WeChat, Published: 2025-11-30 09:01:25
summary: 1） 模型速览：Fara-7B 为 7B 参数的 agentic SLM，专门针对“屏幕感知 + 鼠标键盤操作”场景训练；2） 运行优势：可在用户设备或企业终端本地运行，显著降低对云端依赖，提升隐私与响应速度；

title: Agentic AI如何管理供应链？
comment: Source: WeChat, Published: 2025-11-30 03:00:55
summary: agentic ai正成为供应链中的终极助手，处理艰难且混乱的任务，使团队能够更快、更聪明、更具韧性。高效的供应链管理（SCM）需要应对海量数据、不断变化的变量和多个利益相关者；

summary: A Complete Guide to Transport Layer Security (TLS) Authentication (19 minute read) This comprehensive guide covers TLS authentication fundamentals, including the handshake process, certificate validation chain, and the distinction between server-only authentication and mutual TLS (mTLS) for high-security environments. title: Desktop Application Security Standard: Introducing DASVS

summary: Desktop Application Security Standard: Introducing DASVS (6 minute read) The Desktop Application Security Verification Standard (DASVS) is a comprehensive framework for addressing the unique security challenges of desktop applications across Windows, macOS, and Linux. Unlike web or mobile apps, desktop applications operate with significant system access, which demands specialized security controls. DASVS aims to provide clear, actionable verification rules and is being extended with guides an...

title: Android Quick Share Support for AirDrop: A Secure Approach to Cross-Platform File Sharing
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-11-27, Reading time: 5 minute read, Links: http://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/http:%2F%2Fsecurity.googleblog.com%2F2025%2F11%2Fandroid-quick-share-support-for-airdrop-security.html%3Futm_source=tldrinfosec/1/0100019ac5a5a368-4f68cba6-37d7-4c2a-8cef-25f16194d342-000000/rZ2sZ_BurXoDpDNVPmqACyqDr120TAvwvOZB7teYKaY=433
summary: Android Quick Share Support for AirDrop: A Secure Approach to Cross-Platform File Sharing (5 minute read) Google enabled Quick Share interoperability with AirDrop starting with Pixel 10, using Rust for the core communication layer to eliminate memory-safety vulnerabilities in wireless protocol data parsing—a historically common attack surface. The implementation uses direct peer-to-peer connections without server routing. It underwent internal threat modeling plus independent penetration test...

title: MaleficentVM

summary: MaleficentVM (GitHub Repo) A practice VM designed for learning malware development through CTF-style challenges. Exercises include OS enumeration, shellcode injection into target processes, and IAT hooking techniques.

title: Vijil
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-11-27, Links: https://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fwww.vijil.ai%2F%3Futm_source=tldrinfosec/1/0100019ac5a5a368-4f68cba6-37d7-4c2a-8cef-25f16194d342-000000/9FxGPf2YGKbZrTbkDd1yB9viU7C-XNS8wFi8IF9uytA=433
summary: Vijil (Product Launch) Vijil helps organizations develop secure, reliable AI agents by providing a platform for testing, hardening, and monitoring agents against risks such as prompt injection. It offers modular agent templates, compliance, and runtime protection for confidential deployments.

title: XSSRecon
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-11-27, Links: https://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Frix4uni%2Fxssrecon%3Futm_source=tldrinfosec/1/0100019ac5a5a368-4f68cba6-37d7-4c2a-8cef-25f16194d342-000000/OZoA6bp9NMCylufZLhVvfnQUmi_131D00m27Z7euhpc=433
summary: XSSRecon (GitHub Repo) XSSRecon is a powerful tool designed to help security researchers and penetration testers identify reflected XSS vulnerabilities in web applications. It automates testing URL parameters for the reflection of a test payload and further checks how special characters are handled.

title: FBI: Cybercriminals stole $262M by impersonating bank support teams
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-11-27, Reading time: 2 minute read, Links: https://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fwww.bleepingcomputer.com%2Fnews%2Fsecurity%2Ffbi-cybercriminals-stole-262-million-by-impersonating-bank-support-teams-since-january%2F%3Futm_source=tldrinfosec/1/0100019ac5a5a368-4f68cba6-37d7-4c2a-8cef-25f16194d342-000000/i11ufKFrvqtTAdfIrn6hYEdp8B0OQ13tVWFIZu0WEIA=433
summary: FBI: Cybercriminals stole $262M by impersonating bank support teams (2 minute read) The FBI reported over 5,100 account takeover complaints since January, with attackers impersonating bank staff via calls, texts, and emails to harvest credentials and MFA/OTP codes, then wiring funds to cryptocurrency wallets. Attackers employed SEO poisoning to push phishing sites mimicking financial institutions to the top of search results. Some used dual-impersonation tactics to claim fraudulent transactio...

title: Lifetime access to AI-for-evil WormGPT 4 costs just $220
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-11-27, Reading time: 4 minute read, Links: https://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fwww.theregister.com%2F2025%2F11%2F25%2Fwormgpt_4_evil_ai_lifetime_cost_220_dollars%2F%3Futm_source=tldrinfosec/1/0100019ac5a5a368-4f68cba6-37d7-4c2a-8cef-25f16194d342-000000/cUHNXb4i22HVgLKei8D1CM6k1b61Tk3qWennJdDjwxY=433
summary: Lifetime access to AI-for-evil WormGPT 4 costs just $220 (4 minute read) Malicious AI tools like WormGPT 4 and the free KawaiiGPT are making it easier for cybercriminals to generate malware and phishing messages and to automate parts of attacks. While the code requires some human adjustment to evade detection, these "Dark LLMs" significantly lower the barriers to entry for cyberattacks and social engineering.

title: CISA: Spyware and RATs used to target WhatsApp and Signal Users
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-11-27, Reading time: 2 minute read, Links: https://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fsecurityaffairs.com%2F185047%2Fmalware%2Fcisa-spyware-and-rats-used-to-target-whatsapp-and-signal-users.html%3Futm_source=tldrinfosec/1/0100019ac5a5a368-4f68cba6-37d7-4c2a-8cef-25f16194d342-000000/Va4zcZAiBgOyuH7ULyVghvM4sZpvF-F-eTRjCDsiJCQ=433
summary: CISA: Spyware and RATs used to target WhatsApp and Signal Users (2 minute read) Threat actors are using commercial spyware and remote access trojans to target WhatsApp and Signal users. Attacks involve phishing, malicious QR codes, and impersonated apps. They are focusing on high-value individuals worldwide.

summary: Anthropic CEO called to testify on Chinese AI cyberattack (3 minute read) Anthropic CEO Dario Amondei has been asked to testify at a hearing on December 17 on how Chinese state actors used Claude Code in a wide-reaching cyber-espionage campaign. title: Robinhood CEO's math-focused AI startup Harmonic valued at $1.45 billion in latest fundraising
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-11-27, Reading time: 3 minute read, Links: https://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Flinks.tldrnewsletter.com%2FfEluPT/1/0100019ac5ae0e91-6e88b5ab-bd26-49ec-879a-1bb149da6a01-000000/IWdGva8BYQTViqeu7n1U-ZgBaZQ1qJlJgW3cLJlhia4=433
summary: Robinhood CEO's math-focused AI startup Harmonic valued at $1.45 billion in latest fundraising (3 minute read) Harmonic, co-founded by Robinhood CEO Vlad Tenev, has raised $120 million, valuing the AI startup at $1.45 billion. The company focuses on AI's math and reasoning, aiming to eliminate "hallucinations" and is exploring commercial applications in safety-critical industries. Investors include Ribbit Capital, Sequoia, Kleiner Perkins, and Emerson Collective.
